title: Puzzle Piece Art Hack
intro: Learn how to reuse old jigsaw puzzle pieces to create textured, abstract canvas art. A fun and eco-friendly DIY idea to decorate your walls.

theory.Why Reuse Puzzle Pieces?: Unfinished or old puzzles often remain unused. By turning them into art, you reduce waste and add creativity to your home décor.
theory.Benefits of Puzzle Wall Art: This DIY is eco-friendly, cost-effective, and allows personalization. It creates stylish textured artwork and gives new life to leftover materials.

Step-by-Step Guide.Step 2: Paint them with acrylics (choose solid colors or patterns).
Step-by-Step Guide.Step 4: Arrange pieces on canvas in an abstract or geometric design.
Step-by-Step Guide.Step 5: Glue them in place and let dry fully.
Step-by-Step Guide.Step 6: Hang your puzzle wall art to decorate your room.

Creative Ideas.Abstract Patterns: Scatter pieces randomly for a textured abstract effect.
Creative Ideas.Mosaic Style: Use multiple colors to create a vibrant, mosaic look.
Creative Ideas.Layered Texture: Overlap pieces to make a 3D textured artwork.

activity: Gather leftover puzzle pieces and a canvas.
Paint the pieces in 1–2 chosen colors.
Arrange and glue them into an abstract design.
Optional: Try mosaic or layered style for extra creativity.
